Dating: MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before); NEW KINGDOM (not after)
Technique: FORMED AROUND SAND-KERNEL; TRAILING BY POINTIL
Name: Glass vase
Description: A fine vase made from a dark glass with yellow and white glass patterns. On the lower half of the body are vertical feather-like details while the upper part has the wavy, zigzag patterns. The vase has an elegant neck and wide, flat rim.
